front.title: Analysis of BGP, LDP, PCEP and MSDP Issues According to KARP Design Guide

abstract.t: This document analyzes TCP based routing protocols, Border Gateway Protocol (BGP), Label Distribution Protocol (LDP), Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP), and Multicast Source Distribution Protocol (MSDP) according to guidelines set forth in section 4.2 of Keying and Authentication for Routing Protocols Design Guidelines (RFC6518).
